TextView.android:text: Thickness of drop is kept 25% to 50% \n more than the thickness of the slab
Provide 25% more than the thickness of slab
CHECK FOR CORRECTION DUE TO PATTERN LOADING
The round column shall be considered as the square column of the same area
Check for two way shear is made along longer direction.
The critical section for shear is taken at distance d/2 from face of column.
